verses.verse: מִזְמ֗וֹר <WH4210> A Psalm לְדָ֫וִ֥ד <WH1732> of David יְהוָ֤ה ׀ <WH3068> O LORD שְׁמַ֬ע <WH8085> Hear תְּפִלָּתִ֗י <WH8605> my prayer הַאֲזִ֥ינָה <WH238> give ear אֶל־ <WH413> to תַּחֲנוּנַ֑י <WH8469> to my supplications בֶּאֱמֻנָתְךָ֥ <WH530> in thy faithfulness עֲ֝נֵ֗נִי <WH6030> answer בְּצִדְקָתֶֽךָ׃ <WH6666> me [and] in thy righteousness

וְאַל־ <WH408> not תָּב֣וֹא <WH935> And enter בְ֭מִשְׁפָּט <WH4941> not into judgment אֶת־ <WH854> with עַבְדֶּ֑ךָ <WH5650> with thy servant כִּ֤י <WH3588> for לֹֽא־ <WH3808> no יִצְדַּ֖ק <WH6663> be justified לְפָנֶ֣יךָ <WH6440> for in thy sight כָל־ <WH3605> all manner חָֽי׃ <WH2416> shall no man living

כִּ֥י <WH3588> for רָ֘דַ֤ף <WH7291> hath persecuted אוֹיֵ֨ב ׀ <WH341> For the enemy נַפְשִׁ֗י <WH5315> my soul דִּכָּ֣א <WH1792> down לָ֭אָרֶץ <WH776> to the ground חַיָּתִ֑י <WH2416> my life הוֹשִׁיבַ֥נִי <WH3427> he hath made me to dwell בְ֝מַחֲשַׁכִּ֗ים <WH4285> in darkness כְּמֵתֵ֥י <WH4191> dead עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> as those that have been long

וַתִּתְעַטֵּ֣ף <WH5848> overwhelmed עָלַ֣י <WH5921> within רוּחִ֑י <WH7307> Therefore is my spirit בְּ֝תוֹכִ֗י <WH8432> within יִשְׁתּוֹמֵ֥ם <WH8074> me is desolate לִבִּֽי׃ <WH3820> within me my heart

זָ֘כַ֤רְתִּי <WH2142> I remember יָמִ֨ים ׀ <WH3117> the days מִקֶּ֗דֶם <WH6924> of old הָגִ֥יתִי <WH1897> I meditate בְכָל־ <WH3605> all פָּעֳלֶ֑ךָ <WH6467> on all thy works בְּֽמַעֲשֵׂ֖ה <WH4639> on the work יָדֶ֣יךָ <WH3027> of thy hands אֲשׂוֹחֵֽחַ׃ <WH7878> I muse

פֵּרַ֣שְׂתִּי <WH6566> I stretch forth יָדַ֣י <WH3027> my hands אֵלֶ֑יךָ <WH413> to you נַפְשִׁ֓י ׀ <WH5315> unto thee my soul כְּאֶֽרֶץ־ <WH776> land עֲיֵפָ֖ה <WH5889> [thirsteth] after thee as a thirsty לְךָ֣ סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Selah

מַ֘הֵ֤ר <WH4118> me speedily עֲנֵ֨נִי ׀ <WH6030> Hear יְהוָה֮ <WH3068> O LORD כָּלְתָ֪ה <WH3615> faileth ר֫וּחִ֥י <WH7307> my spirit אַל־ <WH408> not תַּסְתֵּ֣ר <WH5641> hide פָּנֶ֣יךָ <WH6440> not thy face מִמֶּ֑נִּי <WH4480> at וְ֝נִמְשַׁ֗לְתִּי <WH4911> from me lest I be like עִם־ <WH5973> who יֹ֥רְדֵי <WH3381> unto them that go down בֽוֹר׃ <WH953> into the pit

הַשְׁמִ֘יעֵ֤נִי <WH8085> Cause me to hear בַבֹּ֨קֶר ׀ <WH1242> in the morning חַסְדֶּךָ֮ <WH2617> thy lovingkindness כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for בְךָ֪ בָ֫טָ֥חְתִּי <WH982> for in thee do I trust הוֹדִיעֵ֗נִי <WH3045> cause me to know דֶּֽרֶךְ־ <WH1870> the way ז֥וּ <WH2098> wherein אֵלֵ֑ךְ <WH1980> walk כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אֵ֝לֶיךָ <WH413> to נָשָׂ֥אתִי <WH5375> for I lift up נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <WH5315> my soul
הַצִּילֵ֖נִי <WH5337> Deliver מֵאֹיְבַ֥י ׀ <WH341> from mine enemies יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> me O LORD אֵלֶ֥יךָ <WH413> about כִסִּֽתִי׃ <WH3680> I flee unto thee to hide

לַמְּדֵ֤נִי ׀ <WH3925> Teach לַֽעֲשׂ֣וֹת <WH6213> me to do רְצוֹנֶךָ֮ <WH7522> thy will כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אַתָּ֪ה <WH859> you אֱל֫וֹהָ֥י <WH433> God רוּחֲךָ֥ <WH7307> thy spirit טוֹבָ֑ה <WH2896> [is] good תַּ֝נְחֵ֗נִי <WH5148> lead בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> me into the land מִישֽׁוֹר׃ <WH4334> of uprightness

לְמַֽעַן־ <WH4616> the sake שִׁמְךָ֣ <WH8034> for thy name's יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> me O LORD תְּחַיֵּ֑נִי <WH2421> Quicken בְּצִדְקָתְךָ֓ ׀ <WH6666> sake for thy righteousness' תוֹצִ֖יא <WH3318> sake bring מִצָּרָ֣ה <WH6869> out of trouble נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <WH5315> my soul

וּֽבְחַסְדְּךָ֮ <WH2617> And of thy mercy תַּצְמִ֪ית <WH6789> cut off אֹ֫יְבָ֥י <WH341> mine enemies וְֽ֭הַאֲבַדְתָּ <WH6> and destroy כָּל־ <WH3605> all צֹרֲרֵ֣י <WH6887> all them that afflict נַפְשִׁ֑י <WH5315> my soul כִּ֝֗י <WH3588> for אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I עַבְדֶּֽךָ׃ <WH5650> for I [am] thy servant
